text: hey everyone how are you doing I'm happy
to announce that we've officially
launched our YouTube membership program
YouTube membership is a monthly
subscription program that allows you to
support us creating more content this
means that if you're a subscribed member
of the English class 101 YouTube channel
you'll receive special perks and rewards
from us okay so how do you become a
member of our channel and get these
benefits becoming a member is super easy
just find the join button under the
video and that's it you're now an
official member of the English class 101
community what are the perks of becoming
a member first you'll get loyalty badges
loyalty badges show everyone how long
you've been supporting our channel the
longer you support us the better the
badge will be these badges will be
displayed next to your name whenever you
post on the chat on our channel next
you'll get custom emojis we created
custom emoji for our stream viewers to
use like these these emojis will help
you stand out in our crazy live stream
chats as a member of our channel you'll
also get advanced learning resources
from time to time we'll release
infographics ebooks and cheat sheets in
advance via our Members Only community
tab to help our members crush their
language learning goals finally we'll
release early access to our videos
through the members only community tab
sounds pretty good right and it costs
only five dollars a month so join our
English class 101 community and get all
the bonus material exclusive only to
YouTube's membership subscribers join
now find all your perks on the community
tab where you'll see our special
members-only posts and thank you for
your support
